summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a contract with Arthur Young & Company for expert services in conducting an Engineering Department Management Improvement Program, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, declaring the emergency therefor, decreasing the non-departmental 1970 budget item "Expert and Consultant Services - General" by the amount of $30,000 and reappropriating such amount to the item "Services Performed by the Engineering Department" in the General Fund section of the 1970 Budget of said department.
